original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady, rupee at 319.75/320 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT –  Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at close on Monday while the rupee closed at 319.75/320 against the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 27.60/28.00 percent steady from 27.30/90 percent last week.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 26.75/27.00 percent, steady from 26.60/27.00 percent at last close.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 25.60/80 steady from 25.80/26.00 percent last week.
The rupee closed at 319.75/320 to the US dollar in the spot market slightly appreciated from Wednesday’s close at 320/325 rupees. (Colombo/ April17/2023)
